channel.title: Illumini
channel.description:
Hola everyuno,
I'm here to tell everyone something very important, something that made me ponder upon it all night, something that made me think really hard, and then get tired, and after getting tired, go onto pr0nhu... Well, you get it. It was big.
[b]Released![/b] Server is released, play the WEBCLIENT! - Illuminiwc.tk Forums - Www.illumini.co.cc. Will become .com tommorow though :P
[b]Introduction[/b]
This is one of the biggest descisions that i've made towards RSPS. I am going to use a base I have never used (PI), turn it into a sex kingdom (in other words, something "epic"), and then host it. I will also work on this project alone. I will host this when I am done (1-2 months).
Since I love Moparscape so much, I will update this thread every time something big occurs. I will provide pictures, videos, and even some quotes from well-known coders onto this topic. I will also make an update chart.
I call this progress thread and project...
[center][IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Untitled-1.png[/img][/center]
I soon will have a site up (pj-illumini.com) that will be up when I decide to host the server.
[b]Updates[/b]
*Rewrote some classes, because they were indented impoperly (this was for me because I get very angry when I have to look at wrongly-indented lines)
*Some new models, fixed the godwars NPC's.
*Loaded new maps.
*Rewrote the npc spawning, made it much simpler and my-way.
*Remodeled some objects and items so they actually fit in the slot.
*Fully animated any NPC's that were to be usually seen in-game.
*Fixed most notorious dupes and glitches.
*Fixed ancient interface.
*70% done with lunar.
*Fixed duel arena bug.
*Skill menus now available (credits to firecape)
*New PC interfaces (firecape agian)
*Remade rewards.
*Rewrote fight pit minigame.
*Conventioned duel arena (wasnt so pretty).
[b]Working on[/b]
Jobs. It sounds gay, but believe me, it is an awesome idea.
The theory is that there are many jobs available, requiring levels, time, and thinking. Some of them are:
Herblore. Farming. Mining. Smithing. Cooking. Fishing. Killing. Hitman. Running errands. Woodcutting. Listening and acting.
Most of them are what they say, but I will explain the rest:
Running errands - One of the villagers of the town will send you to a different city in Illumini to give someone something, or to pick something up. The farther the place, the more you get paid.
Killing - This is both NPC and player-wise. You could be sent on a task to kill an NPC (the more level, the more you are paid), or sent to kill 2 players in the wildy (any kind).
Hitman - This is one of the hardest, but most paid-for jobs. You will be sent to lure someone into the wildy (regardless of the level), and meant to kill him. Now, I made this so it doesnt get anyone from the same IP, so you can't be on 2 accounts and just hitman eachother. Also, you can only do this job once every 24 hours.
Listening and acting - One of the wise men will talk to you, and he will tell you many things to do. You have to do them in order, and exactally the way he tells you to do it. If he says, "kill 5 chickens", and you kill 6, you lose "points". The more points you have, the better the reward. You can obtain points by how well you do the assignment according to what he says.
[b]Pictures[/b] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-3-20107-11-44PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-3-20107-11-06PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-3-20107-10-09PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-3-20107-09-32PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-3-20107-09-13PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-3-20107-07-07PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-3-20107-05-03PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-3-20107-04-29PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-3-20107-03-55PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-3-20107-03-13PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-3-20107-02-22PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-3-20107-01-42PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-3-20107-00-40PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-1-201011-38-23AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-1-201011-37-31AM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-2-20102-05-24PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-2-201012-09-22PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-2-201012-09-58PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-2-201012-11-03PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-2-201012-11-35PM.png[/img] Doors work in lumbridge and varrock (i'm not really sure how show varrock, since the doors are spread. Maybe i'll do a video of the whole source later on). [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-1-20108-39-03AM.png[/img] Fixed ancient spell book (before it would either freeze, not show all the spells, or not light up when you had the correct runes). [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-1-20108-36-42AM.png[/img] New interfaces for the skill menus. [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-1-20108-08-32AM.png[/img] Starter package (nothing special, I know). [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-1-20107-23-31AM.png[/img] Fixed the ground drop dupe and other notorious dupes. [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Illumini/8-1-20108-39-27AM.png[/img]
Gracias amigos and amigos pretending to be amigas,
Teh l33t Nexuszor_.

item.title: Illumini
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

Hola everyuno,

I’m here to tell everyone something very important, something that made me ponder upon it all night, something that made me think really hard, and then get tired, and after getting tired, go onto pr0nhu… Well, you get it. It was big.

Released!
Server is released, play the WEBCLIENT! - Illuminiwc.tk
Forums - Www.illumini.co.cc. Will become .com tommorow though

Introduction

This is one of the biggest descisions that i’ve made towards RSPS. I am going to use a base I have never used (PI), turn it into a sex kingdom (in other words, something “epic”), and then host it. I will also work on this project alone. I will host this when I am done (1-2 months).

Since I love Moparscape so much, I will update this thread every time something big occurs. I will provide pictures, videos, and even some quotes from well-known coders onto this topic. I will also make an update chart.

I call this progress thread and project…

[center][/center]

I soon will have a site up (pj-illumini.com) that will be up when I decide to host the server.

Updates

*Rewrote some classes, because they were indented impoperly (this was for me because I get very angry when I have to look at wrongly-indented lines)

*Some new models, fixed the godwars NPC’s.

*Loaded new maps.

*Rewrote the npc spawning, made it much simpler and my-way.

*Remodeled some objects and items so they actually fit in the slot.

*Fully animated any NPC’s that were to be usually seen in-game.

*Fixed most notorious dupes and glitches.

*Fixed ancient interface.

*70% done with lunar.

*Fixed duel arena bug.

*Skill menus now available (credits to firecape)

*New PC interfaces (firecape agian)

*Remade rewards.

*Rewrote fight pit minigame.

*Conventioned duel arena (wasnt so pretty).

Working on

Jobs. It sounds gay, but believe me, it is an awesome idea.

The theory is that there are many jobs available, requiring levels, time, and thinking. Some of them are:

Herblore.
Farming.
Mining.
Smithing.
Cooking.
Fishing.
Killing.
Hitman.
Running errands.
Woodcutting.
Listening and acting.

Most of them are what they say, but I will explain the rest:

Running errands - One of the villagers of the town will send you to a different city in Illumini to give someone something, or to pick something up. The farther the place, the more you get paid.

Killing - This is both NPC and player-wise. You could be sent on a task to kill an NPC (the more level, the more you are paid), or sent to kill 2 players in the wildy (any kind).

Hitman - This is one of the hardest, but most paid-for jobs. You will be sent to lure someone into the wildy (regardless of the level), and meant to kill him. Now, I made this so it doesnt get anyone from the same IP, so you can’t be on 2 accounts and just hitman eachother. Also, you can only do this job once every 24 hours.

Listening and acting - One of the wise men will talk to you, and he will tell you many things to do. You have to do them in order, and exactally the way he tells you to do it. If he says, “kill 5 chickens”, and you kill 6, you lose “points”. The more points you have, the better the reward. You can obtain points by how well you do the assignment according to what he says.

Pictures




















Doors work in lumbridge and varrock (i’m not really sure how show varrock, since the doors are spread. Maybe i’ll do a video of the whole source later on).

Fixed ancient spell book (before it would either freeze, not show all the spells, or not light up when you had the correct runes).

New interfaces for the skill menus.

Starter package (nothing special, I know).

Fixed the ground drop dupe and other notorious dupes.

Gracias amigos and amigos pretending to be amigas,

Teh l33t Nexuszor_.

Read full topic
